misc.recruit: **Permanent**: - Joins in Map 1-M: "A Reason to Fight", Turn 1.
misc.promo: - Achieve a Tactics Rank of 18 OR at the start of Chapter 10.
misc.prf:
**1.** Perseid; In starting inventory
**2.** Gram; In Ch. 5 Letter
**3.** Tulsa Circlet; In Ch. 9 Letter
**4.** Nothung; Start of Ch. 13

misc.recruit: **Permanent**: - Joins in Map 1-M: "A Reason to Fight", Turn 1.
**Permanent**: - Joins in Map 1-M: "A Reason to Fight", Turn 1.
**Permanent**: - Joins in Map 1-M: "A Reason to Fight", Turn 1.
**Permanent**: - Joins in Map 1-M: "A Reason to Fight", Turn 1.
**Permanent**: - Joins in Map 1-M: "A Reason to Fight", Turn 4.
**Permanent**: - Joins in Map 1-M: "A Reason to Fight", Turn 4.

**Mercenary**: - [Mercenary Guild] After completing Map 1-M: "A Reason to Fight".
**Permanent**: - After he has killed 60+ enemies, view the city event "Scars of War".
Izerna must be alive and recruited.
**Permanent**: - After completing or declining Map 1-1: "Cruel Brothers".

**Mercenary**: - [Tavern] After completing Map 1-M: "A Reason to Fight".
**Permanent**: **Method A**: - Raise Volo's Happiness to 12+, then view the city event "Aloof Swordsman".
**Method B**: If (A) Faye is killed before talking to Chaos in Map 3-M: "The Three Priests" or (B) Chaos was defeated in "The Three Priests": view the event involving Leticia during the map by allowing NPC Sakhalin to visit the building on the east. 
Then, raise Volo's Happiness to 5+ and view the city event "Wanted Man" at the start of Chapter 7. 
During Map 7-M: "Rescue Mission", have Volo enter the church; he will leave the battlefield and become unavailable, then rejoin permanently after completing Map 9-M: "Breaking Bridges".

**Mercenary**: - [Abbey] After completing Map 1-M: "A Reason to Fight".
**Permanent**: - Raise his Happiness to 5+, then have him visit the house on the left side of the map in Map 9-M: "Breaking Bridges".
After concluding "Breaking Bridges", view the city event "Old Wounds".

**Mercenary**: - [Mercenary Guild] After completing Map 1-1: "Cruel Brothers".
**Permanent**: - After completing Map X-1: "Hero of the Seas".
(To unlock Map X-1: after completing Map 5-M: "Hold the Fort", view the city event "Bounty Hunter"; then, after raising Sylvis's Happiness to 12+ and her Level to 10+, view the city event "Her Circumstances".)

**Mercenary**: - [Mercenary Guild] After completing Map 1-2: "Fledgling Knights".
**Permanent**: - After completing Map X-3: "A Knight's Pride".
(To unlock Map X-3: Raise Ruby's Happiness to 11+ and her Level to 10+, and keep Clifford alive.)
misc.promo: - Level 10, 20 Sword, 20 Spear, 20 S Shield, got a level up after being permanently recruited

misc.recruit:
**Mercenary**: - [Mercenary Guild] After completing Map 1-2: "Fledgling Knights".
**Permanent**: **Method A**: - View the city event "Dishonor" after Map 1-2: "Fledgling Knights", raise his Happiness to 10+, then view the city event "Exile".
**Method B**: - Automatic, if his Happiness is 1+ at the start of Chapter 8.
misc.promo: - Level 10, 20 Sword, 20 S Shield, 10 M Shield, got a level up after being permanently recruited

misc.recruit: **Permanent**: - Talk to her with Reese in Map 2-M: "Bandit Suppression", then complete Map 2-1: "In Pursuit of Thieves".
misc.promo: - Deployed in Map 3-2: "Ponies and Thieves", Level 10
misc.prf: Tico; When promoted; Horse: +1 Dmg, +5 Spd, +1 Move, Grants Horse-Lover

misc.recruit:
**Mercenary**: - [Mercenary Guild] After completing Map 2-M: "Bandit Suppression".
**Permanent**: - After completing Map X-2: "Stolen Sword" and giving him the sword Balmung.
 (To unlock Map X-2: Raise Kramer's Happiness to 9+ and his Level to 10+.)
misc.prf: Balmung: When given to him after X-2

misc.recruit:
**Mercenary**: - [Mercenary Guild] After completing Map 2: "Bandit Suppression".
**Permanent**: - After completing Map X-4: "The Altar of Raze", she will become temporarily unavailable; then, at the start of the next chapter, view the city event "Newfound Power".
 (To unlock Map X-4: After raising Faye's Happiness to 6+, view the city event "Warrior of Izmil".
 Then, raise Faye's Happiness to 12+ and her Level to 10+ while keeping Faramir alive.
 (After the conclusion of Chapter 11, the 12+ Happiness requirement is no longer needed.))
misc.prf:
**1.** Cutlass; In starting inventory
**2.** Vritra; Talk to Theodore in Ch15

misc.recruit:
**Mercenary**: - [Mercenary Guild] Let him survive in Map 2-2: "Combat Training".
**Permanent**: - After Enid has class changed and Derrick's Happiness is 3+, view the city event "Seek the Truth".

**Mercenary**: - [Tavern] Start Chapter 3.
**Permanent**: - After Ruby's promotion, view the city event "Fake Contest".
(City events relating to Ruby, such as "Father and Daughter" in Chapter 1, must also have been viewed.)

**Mercenary**: - [Mercenary Guild] After completing Map 3-M: "The Three Priests".
**Permanent**: - After Faye has been permanently recruited and Faramir's Happiness is 3+, view the city event "The Wanderer".

**Mercenary**: - [Mercenary Guild] Talk to him with Christine in Map 3-M: "The Three Priests" (appears on turn 20).
**Permanent**: - View the city event "Arina's Wish" in Chapter 3, then have Esteban participate in Map 6-M: "On the Front Lines" without being captured.
During Map 9-M: "Breaking Bridges", the castle gate must be opened and the subsequent event viewed.
After completing Map 9-M, Esteban's happiness must be 5+. (Esteban need not have been deployed in "Breaking Bridges".) Finally view the city event "A Man's Naïveté".
misc.prf: Pascanion; Recruit him permanently, talk to or defeat Sophie in Map 9-Main: "Breaking Bridges", Deploy him in Map 10-2: "Scorpion's Sting" and capture Luveil.

misc.recruit: **Permanent**: - After completing Map 3-1: "Maiden and Mercenary".
misc.prf: Pallas Riana; Complete Map 3-1: "Maiden and Mercenary".

misc.recruit:
**Mercenary**: - [Mercenary Guild] After completing Map 3-1: "Maiden and Mercenary".
**Permanent**: - View the city event "Traitor" after Map 4-M: "Covering the Retreat".
Before Map 8-M: "The Wooden Cavalry", view the city event "Letter".
During "The Wooden Cavalry", have Sherpa talk to Kay.
Then, once his Happiness has been raised to 1+, view the city event "Highlander".

**Mercenary**: - [Abbey] Start Chapter 4
**Permanent**: - After completing Map 12-1: "The Heathen God", if her Happiness is 1+.
misc.promo: - Save all the women in Map 12-1: "The Heathen God".
misc.prf: Starlight (usable after promotion); After completing Map 7-1: "Ancient Treasure".

misc.recruit:
**Mercenary**: - [Veria Temple] Start Chapter 4, if Grimm reached the church in Map 3-M: "The Three Priests".
**Permanent**: - After completing Map 11-1: "Island of Exile", view the city event "Boundary".
By the completion of "Island of Exile", Owen's happiness must have been raised to 5+.
Then, complete Map 12-1: "The Heathen God" (during which he will be an essential unit).
At the conclusion of "The Heathen God", view the city event "The True God".
**Permanent**: - After completing Map 4: "Covering the Retreat", if all allied soldiers survived and escaped.
misc.promo: - Level 15, 30 Axe, 20 S Shield, 10 M Shield

misc.recruit:
**Mercenary**: - [Dungeon] In Map 4: "Covering the Retreat", talk to her with Reese, or let her talk to him (she appears on turn 13 as an enemy).
**Permanent**: - Promote Reese.

**Mercenary**: - [Lower Streets] After completing Map 4-2: "Hero of the Streets".
**Permanent**: - Spend 5000 Denarii on him by hiring him several times.
**Permanent**: - After completing Map 5: "Hold the Fort", if all civilians survived.
misc.prf: Zweihander; Complete Map 8-2: "Situation in the Armory".

misc.recruit: **Permanent**: - After completing Map 6-M: "On the Front Lines", view the city event "Staring Eyes".
misc.promo: - 5 Magic after the start of Chapter 8, Perceval is alive.

misc.recruit:
**Mercenary**: - [Mercenary Guild] After completing Map 6-M: "On the Front Lines", if Perceval was recruited by Enid.
**Permanent**: - After raising his Happiness to 2+, have Perceval attack the enemy who has captured Izerna in Map 12-1: "The Heathen God"; Perceval will leave the battlefield, and he will be recruited permanently at the conclusion of "The Heathen God".
**Permanent**: - At the start of Chapter 9, if Burroughs and all other NPC ballisticians successfully escaped in Map 8-M: "The Wooden Cavalry".
**Permanent**: - After completing Map 10-M: "The Holy Knight".
**Permanent**: - After completing Map 12-1: "The Heathen God", if Saphira is alive and has been permanently recruited.
**Permanent**: - After completing Map 14: "The Gathering".
misc.prf:
**1.** Pallas Serenia; In starting Inventory
**2.** Serenia Bow; In starting inventory

misc.recruit: Playable for half of Map 12-M: "The Dark Cardinal", talk to him with Alvina or Reese if Alvina is dead.
